derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : origin ally denoting cloth made 72 inches wide, as opposed to 'strait' cloth, 36 inches wide. The term now implies quality rather than width

means.word_mean: 1. a densely textured woolen fabric with a lustrous finish
2. a closely woven silk or synthetic fabric with a narrow crosswise rib
